mapper.select: select count(*) from inventory

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, INVEN_ID, BOOK_ID, CLIENT_ID, STORE_ID, REFUND_ID, PREV_INVEN_ID, INCREASE, CURR_INVEN, INVEN_DATE, CLASSIFY, REMARK, book_name, client_name FROM (SELECT * FROM INVENTORY join client using (client_id) join book using (book_id) ORDER BY INVEN_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{ startRow } AND #{ endRow }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INVENTORY WHERE INVEN_DATE BETWEEN #{ begin } and (to_date(#{ end }) + 1 - 1/86400)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, INVEN_ID, BOOK_ID, CLIENT_ID, STORE_ID, REFUND_ID, PREV_INVEN_ID, INCREASE, CURR_INVEN, INVEN_DATE, CLASSIFY, REMARK, BOOK_NAME, CLIENT_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM INVENTORY LEFT JOIN CLIENT USING (CLIENT_ID) LEFT JOIN BOOK USING (BOOK_ID) WHERE INVEN_DATE BETWEEN #{ begin } AND (TO_DATE(#{ end }) + 1 - 1/86400))) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{ startRow } AND #{ endRow } ORDER BY INVEN_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM INVENTORY JOIN BOOK USING (BOOK_ID) WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ORDER BY INVEN_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INVENTORY JOIN BOOK USING (BOOK_ID) WHERE BOOK_ID LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INVENTORY JOIN BOOK USING (BOOK_ID) WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLIENT JOIN INVENTORY using (CLIENT_ID) WHERE CLIENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RUM, SUB.* FROM(SELECT * FROM INVENTORY WHERE BOOK_ID LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ORDER BY BOOK_ID DESC) SUB) LEFT JOIN BOOK USING (BOOK_ID) LEFT JOIN CLIENT USING (CLIENT_ID) WHERE RUM >= #{ startRow } AND RUM <= #{ endRow }

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RUM, SUB.* FROM (SELECT * FROM INVENTORY LEFT JOIN BOOK USING (BOOK_ID) LEFT JOIN CLIENT USING (CLIENT_ID) WHERE BOOK_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' ORDER BY BOOK_ID DESC) SUB) WHERE RUM >= #{ startRow } AND RUM <= #{ endRow }
